DOC.brief_summary: The objective study clinically evaluate safety effectiveness new multi-purpose disinfect solution soft contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Investigational Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solution Care Soft Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: Successful daily wear FDA Group I IV lens twoweek longer replacement schedule least one month . Use multipurpose solution prestudy care regimen least one month ( rewetting drop use also acceptable ) . Successful lens wear least 8 hour per day . Vision correctable 20/30 . Normal eye current ocular abnormality prevent successful contact lens wear . No corneal surgery within past 12 month . No systemic disease affect eye could worsen use contact lens solution . No overthecounter prescription ocular medication . No enrollment another clinical study within 30 day prior enrollment .
